TEXT.English: Available with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Trade[COLOR_REVERT] caravans can be used to build buildings or get cash at foriegn cities.
TEXT.French: Disponible avec [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Echanges[COLOR_REVERT], les caravanes peuvent être utilisées pour construire des bâtiments et récupérer de l'Or des Villes étrangères.
TEXT.German: Available with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Trade[COLOR_REVERT] caravans can be used to build buildings or get cash at foriegn cities.
TEXT.Italian: Available with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Trade[COLOR_REVERT] caravans can be used to build buildings or get cash at foriegn cities.
TEXT.Spanish: Available with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Trade[COLOR_REVERT] caravans can be used to build buildings or get cash at foriegn cities.
